FAQ

I appreciate your work so much, what can I do to support you and LUMT?

LUMT is a non-profit project, wich means that I donâ€™t want to make any money with it while also trying to not lose any. Although you can still support me by doing one or multiple things on this list:

  • Give this repository a star on GitHub
  • Follow me on GitHub
  • Contribute to LUMT
    • Create a request for a new item
    • Add a search bar (this would be so awesome)
    • Add a blog post
    • Something other
  • Become a Supporter
  • If you mind spending a few dollars
    • Buy a domain for LUMT (See here)

How do you manage this site?

I use GitHub Pages for hosting, and a free domain for the domain. See this.

Note: This website is still in development.
